ygData.subject: Re: Smithing and special item
ygData.msgSnippet: I HAVE a mold for making a sword I just need to know the recipe. And what are the stats for the resulting item? Bael Indigo Warrior also known as the Blue
ygData.messageBody:
I HAVE a mold for making a sword I just need to know the recipe. And what are the stats for the resulting item?

Bael
Indigo Warrior
also known as the "Blue Meanie"

-----Original Message-----
From: Jynxx <Jynxx@...>
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, June 09, 1999 12:19 PM
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Smithing and special item


��
All I really know about making things such as that are that you need:
A forge
Flasks of Water
Sheets Of Metal (or metal bits, depending on size of item)
And the mold for the item.
As far as I was able to discern, you can't make weapons just yet....only mundane items and armor, making the smithing skill pretty worthless.
Just my 2 cents ;-}~

Tyveris
